name: Orangutanga Banga
description:
Orangutanga Banga is a Beat-em-Up' Arena game where you consistently evolve from monkey into man. However, you can't keep up that form for too long...

The Orangutan is agile and quick, but a glass cannon only capable of melee attacks, while the Caveman is slower performing larger area attacks and is capable of hurling huge rocks toward the enemy. Use the balance of your two forms and see how long you can last in the harsh pits of the jungle.

Controls

Movement - WASD
M1 - Melee/Dash Attack
M2 - Pick up large rocks (Caveman form only).

Team

  • Ethan Uy - Programmer
  • Darren Contreras - Caveman Character & Animation
  • Ethan Buot - General Props, UI 
  • Christian Logoia - Environment, Monkey Animations
  • Sangwoo Lee - VFX
